entry.title: Friday: Near blizzard. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Near blizzard developing this morning and ending this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
